title: Minimalist Investing
itunes:title: Minimalist Investing
description:
We believe investing is important, but it doesn't have to be complicated. There is an approach for stock market involvement and saving for retirement or other large expenses that is simple and minimalist. Join us as we aim to remove some of those investment 'barriers to entry'.

Get full show notes here!

  • Get our FREE 7-Day No-Spend Challenge Workbook here! https://www.frugalfriendspodcast.com/free 
  • Join the waitlist for Club BFF: https://www.frugalfriendspodcast.com/club-bff-waitlist/ 
  • Subscribe for more on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/frugalfriends 
  • Hang out with us on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/frugalfriendspodcast/ 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
